MOM 6



#1
PROB 70: SC.CV 1 N Y
PROB 10: X RRND 4 10
PROB 5: Y P RRND 3 X
PROB 10: Z P RRND X 15
SC.CV.SLEW RND 20 RND 4000

#2

#3
IF ! STATE 7: SC.TR.P 1

#4
PROB 4: SC.CV 11 RND 32000
J ! % T 8
IF J: SC.CV 30 N P RRND 1 4

#5
IF ! STATE 4: SC.TR.P 30

#6

#7
IF || % T 2 STATE 5: BRK
PROB 40: J P RRND 5 10
SC.CV 31 N J; SC.TR 31 0
IF > K 0: K - K 1; BRK
PROB 5: K RRND 2 8
SC.TR 31 ! ! RND 5

#8
CV 1 32000; J % T 64
IF && ! % T 4 > J 47: TR.P 4
DEL 20: CV 1 0
IF ! || J == P.N PRM: P.N PRM

#M
$ 8
L 1 7: $ I
T + T 1
SC.TR.P 100
IF STATE 5: SC.TR 31 0

#I
M 200; T 0; M.ACT 0
PARAM.SCALE 0 3
L 1 8: MUTE I 1
TR.TIME 1 + M 20
SC.TR 31 0

#P
16	16	16	16
1	1	1	1
0	0	0	0

#G
